prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Mrs. John Miller and Miss Samuella Crim of New Market in September, 1987.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The items in the collection are a 1791 plat of New Market, VA; an 1806 partial resurvey of Peter Palsel's 1785 plat of New Market, by Jacob Rinker; an 1873 map of New Market, platted by C.K. Urner, by order of the Board of Trustees.
